subtitles.text: The sea, with its vastness and mystery, has always fascinated humanity.
It covers over 70% of our planet, acting as a source of life, commerce, and adventure.
From the gentle lapping of waves on the shore to the powerful storms that can arise in an instant.
The sea reminds us of nature's beauty and unpredictability.
It provides countless resources, yet requires our respect and stewardship to preserve its delicate ecosystems.
Whether for relaxation, exploration, or inspiration, the sea holds an enduring place in our hearts and history.
